snippet.title: Gloomhaven Console | Pre-order trailer
snippet.description:
Gloomhaven is coming to consoles September 18, 2023.

PRE-ORDER ON
🔗 Nintendo Switch US ➡ http://bit.ly/GHNintendoUS
🔗 Nintendo Switch EU ➡ http://bit.ly/GHNintendoEU
🔗 Xbox One & XBox Series X/S ➡ http://bit.ly/GHonXbox
🔗 PS4 & PS5 ➡ http://bit.ly/GHonPlayStation

Embark on an unforgettable journey through its thrilling mix of dungeon-crawling and tactical-RPG.
Gloomhaven is the digital adaptation of the acclaimed strategy board game by Isaac Childres. 
Explore the world with your band of mercenaries, each coming with their own skills and cards for more than 1,000 different abilities to master! 
Earn your gold or die trying.

🔥 Be sure to subscribe to this channel to stay tuned!

 ⚔ Join the community on Discord:
https://discord.gg/gloomhaven

📢 Be the first mercenary informed on Facebook and Twitter:
https://twitter.com/GloomhavenGame
https://www.facebook.com/GloomhavenGame
https://www.facebook.com/groups/GloomhavenDigital/
